summary:
Software Engineer & PhD in Computer Science, with over 6 years experience among academy and industry. During this time, I have focused on research and teaching activities in public institutions in Argentina and France, but I have also worked as a software engineer and mobile developer.
As a researcher, I am proficient in Machine Learning and Optimization techniques, applied to mobile and cloud computing domains. As a mobile developer, I have undertaken some successful applications and gained experience in technologies such as Android SDK, React Native and Firebase. I am also proficient in Java and Python development, with experience in Spring and Django frameworks.
I consider myself a proactive and responsible engineer, used to work under pressure and always looking for new challenges involving new technologies and teamwork.

education.title: PhD in Computer Science
education.thesisTitle: Optimization of Feature Models with applications for the adaptation of service compositions

education.title: Systems Engineer (Software)
education.thesisTitle: A Web tool for assisting the documentation of software architectures
